metadata.title: Pacsafe Metrosafe X Anti Theft Sling Pack
features: ANTI-THEFT - With lockable Zippers & Cut Proof Material (lightweight steel mesh) to prevent theft, plus an RFID blocking pocket to keep your credit cards/IDs safe. This new 2020 version can be secured & also locked to fixtures with detachable anchor strap.

ORGANIZATION - This sling has a messenger style opening with magnetic closure. Lockable Zipper Main Compartment w/ Padded 10" Tablet Sleeve, 1* RFIDsafe Pocket; Interior Pocket, Pen Loop; Front Zipper Pockets and Hidden Back Pocket w/ Key Clip

VERSATILE - Shoulder strap is adjustable, with a maximum length of 46. 5". With the expandable design, sling pack is always ready for extra storage. With external attachment points (molle straps) for small items like phone pouches or reusable water bottles

MADE FROM RECYCLED POLYESTER - Travel sling is made of Polyester made from recycled plastic waste, such as plastic bottles. Material has the same quality as brand new Polyester with a smaller environmental footprint.

DIMENSIONS, WEIGHT & - 12. 2"H x 14. 8"W x 4. 1"D, 0. 97 lbs. Made of soft, durable, water resistant and easy to clean recycled Polyester to ensure long-lasting usage of this pouch everyday & during weekends. Comes with a 5-year Pacsafe .
description: For those who like to move at a fast city pace with their things secured on their body. This anti-theft sling made from recycled PET has a messenger-style opening with a magnetic closure, soft-lined 10'' tablet sleeve, a hidden back pocket to stash your wallet or phone, plus other smart security features.
